comments.author: CJ Willcock
comments.content:
Wow! I am incredibly jealous of your plans.

You can come visit my family in Prince Edward Island, Canada anytime. We (PEI) are 15/1000 the size of Japan and have 1/1000 of the population. Most everybody speaks English and / or French. Lots of beaches (no mountains - sorry?) and we have a packed gravel biking trail that runs the length of the island (the old train tracks w/ rails and ties removed).

You will have to learn PHP/MySQL for me to pay you anything and you may still need to eat ramen; maybe live in a tent ;-). You could be an interpreter for a season to all the Japanese Tourists that visit.

I checked a map to see how far apart we are by bike (assuming you in Tokyo, Japan and us in Summerside, PE at Google Maps) -- 16,398 km. It would be a few years journey I expect... and you would need a thermal wet-suit for parts of the journey too (#s 173 and 196).

No matter where your journey takes you, I hope you do well and keep at your blogging -- it's a daily read for me!


All the best,
CJW
